overview: The in-depth study of history's greatest combat bomber.  Baptized in the aerial battlefields over Europe and Asia the immortal B-17 re-wrote the strategies of WWII.  Exciting new footage from the prototype rollouts to the hell of combat, here is the definitive work, a video masterpiece, about the most battle-honored bomber in history.
tagline: There will never be another aircraft like the venerable B-17.  Times have changed, war has changed, people have changed...
title: B-17 Flying Fortress
